price: But the Hour is their appointed time, and the Hour is more catastrophic and more bitter.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
